channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: KitchenAid Promo Codes and Coupons: $200 Off
item.description: Get $200 off select stand mixers, 15% off, free delivery, and other great savings today on WIRED.
